    Aggregate monitoring periods for ACM0001

    aggregate_monitoring_periods.Rd

    Summarises landfill gas monitoring data into period-level totals following the ACM0001 baseline, project, leakage, and emission reduction workflow, including methane destruction mass and CO2e.

    aggregate_monitoring_periods(monitoring_data)

    Arguments

    monitoring_data

    Tibble or data frame containing landfill gas monitoring observations with ACM0001-required columns. The data must include at least `period`, `methane_generation_m3`, `baseline_capture_efficiency`, `methane_captured_m3`, `destruction_efficiency`, `auxiliary_fuel_tj`, `auxiliary_ef_t_per_tj`, `electricity_import_mwh`, `import_ef_t_per_mwh`, and `leakage_fraction`. Optional columns `methane_density_t_per_m3`, `gwp_ch4`, and `oxidation_fraction` override default parameter values.

    Value

    A tibble summarising each monitoring period with emissions and methane destruction metrics.

    Examples

    data <- simulate_acm0001_dataset(3, seed = 42)
aggregate_monitoring_periods(data)
#> # A tibble: 3 × 19
#>   period    methane_generation_m3 baseline_capture_efficie…¹ methane_captured_m3
#>   <chr>                     <dbl>                      <dbl>               <dbl>
#> 1 Period 01                 5185.                    0.00374               1460.
#> 2 Period 02                 4218.                    0.0974                1140.
#> 3 Period 03                 4682.                    0.0432                1146.
#> # ℹ abbreviated name: ¹​baseline_capture_efficiency
#> # ℹ 15 more variables: destruction_efficiency <dbl>, auxiliary_fuel_tj <dbl>,
#> #   auxiliary_ef_t_per_tj <dbl>, electricity_import_mwh <dbl>,
#> #   import_ef_t_per_mwh <dbl>, leakage_fraction <dbl>,
#> #   oxidation_fraction <dbl>, methane_density_t_per_m3 <dbl>, gwp_ch4 <dbl>,
#> #   baseline_emissions <dbl>, project_emissions <dbl>, leakage_emissions <dbl>,
#> #   methane_destroyed_t <dbl>, methane_destroyed_co2e <dbl>, …
